item.description:
Do something different for Halloween this year Madams...
Come join us in your best, scariest, sexiest, and/or most imaginative costume, to celebrate with your girls at the Multicultural Women's Meetup!

Prizes!
-At Studio Square, we'll enter to win a $10,000 Halloween costume contest at Studio Square's Beer Garden Haunted Halloween Party.

-Also the First 5 women to sign up for this event and fill out the groups poll on the site (under "More" above) will get a Halloween Surprise & Treat!!!! courtesy of our group, The Astoria/NYC Multicultural Women's Social Meetup


What's the Halloween Fare @ Studio Sq...
We'll enjoy great chatter, drinks, dancing and food together at the beer garden. Halloween fare can be bought at a reasonable price and offers both typical beer garden food like hamburgers and sausage to sushi and red velvet cup cakes...
Cocktails, and Sangria are also available...

What else will be there
A live DJ will be available, so all you single ladies, maybe you'll find an extra "treat" or something "sweet" on the dance floor to take home in your Halloween goody bag LOL!

*If your looking for a costume, but would prefer a girlfriends opinion, come join us at the Halloween Costume Search Event with us, scheduled for Sunday October 24th!"

SEE YOU THERE GALS!
item.how_to_find_us: Call my cell, number to be given closer to event date...
item.name: Don't Spend Halloween Alone: “Fear Garden” Halloween Party @ Studio Square
